website_summaries.verdict: With a 10 billion culture count, Vitamin Bounty is suited for sensitive stomachs.
pros: Multiple users say that they notice improvements in bacterial vaginosis
Also helps with mild digestive problems
cons: May still cause stomach discomfort for some

customer_reviews.title: Works for me!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these probiotics hoping they would help with my reoccurring yeast/bacterial infections. So far I have been able to keep both at bay using these daily probiotics, along with boric acid suppositories. Love that they are specifically formulated for women. I did have one capsule that was broken and had gotten the powder all over inside the bottle, but understand that can happen. Great product and will be purchasing again soon!
customer_reviews.author: Joey

customer_reviews.title: Great Product for a First Time Probiotic User
customer_reviews.text: I have enjoyed trying this product. I purchased it because of the great reviews it has online and it hasn't disappointed. Definitely helps me to feel overall better about my health.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny

customer_reviews.title: I am very pleased with outcome
customer_reviews.text: A couple of weeks ago, I was experiencing symptoms of a possible UTI. I had lower back pain and frequent urination. I did some research on taking probiotics and decided to give this one a shot. I have been taking 2 capsules with a meal for 4 days now. To my surprise, my symptoms are going away and it has only been 4 days. I am very pleased with outcome!
customer_reviews.author: Dori M.

customer_reviews.title: Gut feels so much better
customer_reviews.text: I very rarely bother to write reviews but I needed to post this one. I originally purchased this product purely to rebuild by gut bacteria after a course of antibiotics. Prior to this, I had always experienced constipation and bloating but was using laxatives instead. This product makes pooping so much easier. No more laxatives. Will continue to take from now on.
customer_reviews.author: DMH

customer_reviews.title: I would buy it again
customer_reviews.text: So far this probiotic has worked very well. I have chronic female issues with yeast and bacteria and I haven't had any issues since using this product.
customer_reviews.author: J Beth

customer_reviews.title: Does NOT work at ALL!
customer_reviews.text: I have tried a few probiotics because I need them due to my endometriosis & Urinary Problems (possible IC) and I tried this one due to the reviews, but I have taken it for three days now and it is not working at ALL. I am sticking with others, no more trying new ones. I am struggling with UTI symptoms now... do not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Megan Priestner

customer_reviews.title: Saving Grace
customer_reviews.text: I have had stomach problems for years (cramping, bubble guts, diarrhea) and have tried many different things to help, including consulting with a doctor. All they could tell me was that theres nothing they could do but give me Reglan. I finally decided to take a chance on probiotics but the first few I tried didnt work or upset my stomach even more. Then I found Vitamin Bounty and my search is finally over! NO more pain or stomach problems and Ive even lost 10 pounds without even trying since starting this product.
customer_reviews.author: HuLissa

customer_reviews.title: STOP ATTACHING WHITE STICKERS TO THE PRODUCT!
customer_reviews.text: A white sticker with a product scan code was placed over the intake instructions and other pertinent information about this product. I am unable to tell what the daily dosage and other instructions are. As I carefully tried to remove the sticker it tore up the underlying label rendering it useless and unreadable.
customer_reviews.author: Frank R.

customer_reviews.title: BV no more
customer_reviews.text: Ive been taking it for 5 days for BV (after years of battling it with little to no help from medical professionals) and I'm already seeing results!! Ladies, this is sweet sweet freedom.
customer_reviews.author: Cole

customer_reviews.title: Just OK
customer_reviews.text: I was hoping for great results from this Probiotic, but it turned out to be just ok, a bit disappointed. I've tried about 10 different Probiotics, this one ranks about #6.. That's not to say it won't work for someone else, it may be simply the best, I am learning that different Probiotics are going to be different for everyone, keep searching until you find the right one and don't ignore the low price unknown or store brand, they can work just as well as the popular ones. This one however, was just ok.
customer_reviews.author: Isaac Morrison

customer_reviews.title: Changed my life
customer_reviews.text: I was constantly having yeast infections and BV back to back the last two years. I kept going to the doctor to get medicine for both of these problems I had, yet they kept coming back. It was my sister who recommended this to me and told me it would regulate my vaginal health, and it did! I just repurchased my second bottle through Amazon and it came same day shipping which was perfect because I ran out just yesterday. This has really changed my life and I will never stop taking these. I haven't had any feminine issues since I have been taking this and truly recommend this to every women out there!
customer_reviews.author: Priscilla

customer_reviews.title: just figured i had probably killed everything good. They helped my digestive track a lot more ...
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these after 3 z-pac treatments in 2 months; just figured i had probably killed everything good. They helped my digestive track a lot more than i thought they would and did not upset my stomach (I'm very sensitive to vitamins).
customer_reviews.author: Introvert kitty

customer_reviews.title: NO free bottle
customer_reviews.text: I wrote a nice review because I was told I would receive a free bottle of this probiotic. Unfortunately that appears to be a lie.
customer_reviews.author: Zachary Inghram

customer_reviews.title: I used to have trouble digesting certain foods, such ...
customer_reviews.text: I used to have trouble digesting certain foods, such as brown rice and vegetables. On some days, my stomach would also be consistently making sounds, which was uncomfortable and embarrassing. I also almost consistently suffered from constipation or diarrhea, one or the other. After taking these probiotics, the biggest difference I have noticed is that I no longer have trouble digesting certain foods.
customer_reviews.author: vk

customer_reviews.title: Restores Balance After Taking Antibiotics
customer_reviews.text: I was on antibiotics for a bronchial infection and needed a good probiotic to take to restore my gut bacteria. I took it in-between the antibiotics and now to recreate a healthy digestive and immune system. I am finding it works very well as I am regular and feeling back to normal. I also like that it can be stored without refrigeration and that it is suitable for vegans.
customer_reviews.author: R. Adams

customer_reviews.title: Bought due to unbalanced hormones due to the pill (birth control)
customer_reviews.text: I have been dealing with some unpleasantness "down there" with a not so pleasant odor after switching birth controls. I thought this probiotic would do the trick because it would be targeting this area, but I have not noticed a difference. I have been using this product for about 2 months everyday twice a day (some days forgetting), but I thought I would see a change by now. I guess this product isn't doing the trick because of my new prescribed birth control how the strength of it. I can see this probiotic working for others though!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Horrible for me
customer_reviews.text: The pills gave me cramps/ovaries pain. I tried them for 3 days straight and ended up stopping because it was way too painful. Disappointing!
customer_reviews.author: Adja Ly

customer_reviews.title: BOTTLE CAME OPENED
customer_reviews.text: The product came open! The safety seal was broken. By the time I got around to trying to return it the return window closed. How am I supposed to trust what is in the bottle if it comes and the safety seal is opened. NOT OKAY. throwing them away.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: Life Changing
customer_reviews.text: HIGHLY RECOMMENDED!!!! When I tell you this product is a life changer I am sincere. I have not tolerated dairy in many years. After taking Vitamin Bounty Womens Probiotic for about 3 weeks I tried a dish of ice cream. No distress at all. I am still careful with dairy but I have had no issues since taking this probiotic. As an added benefit this probiotic does not need to be refrigerated. This is extremely important when traveling. Lastly, other probiotics I have unsuccessfully tried in the past kept me awake night after night. I have not experienced this at all with Vitamin Bounty I will not be without this product!!! Thank you Vitamin Bounty.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I am in my mid-30's and my body is changing. I have been experiencing some BV, especially after intercourse. I tried one other supplement and it helped for a couple of weeks, but then stopped working as well. These are consistently working and don't just help, it's taken the BV away. Will keep using these!
customer_reviews.author: Gena Ricker

customer_reviews.title: If you take probiotics, take these
customer_reviews.text: I have these little gems on my subscription order. I only want one month's worth at a time so they stay fresh. They are easy to take and nice to have on hand without going to the store. Do they do any good? How is one supposed to know? I feel fine, everything digest-wise is working so I have to think probably. This company is reasonable, dependable and does well in customer service. They always send me an email asking if I am satisfied. .
customer_reviews.author: busy household

customer_reviews.title: Helps with my IBS naturally
customer_reviews.text: This product has proven to help with my IBS so far. I am very pleased with it, plus its added benefits.
customer_reviews.author: Renu

customer_reviews.title: From Bad to Worse
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately these vitamins did not work for me. Started having symptoms of BV so after reading the reviews decided to give them a try. They arrived on a Sunday and I immediately started to take them according to the directions, I proceeded to take them as instructed. The first thing I noticed was the breakouts on my face, by that Thursday no relief to the symptoms I was having and then things got worse. I became so constipated until I ended up in the ER at 11:00am and wasn’t able to go until 4:45pm and then to make matters worse it tore me, which created other problems. Long story short thanks but no thanks!!!
customer_reviews.author: DeeDee

customer_reviews.title: Easily tolerable Probiotic
customer_reviews.text: I don't think I can say I love a probiotic, but it seems to be a very nicely tolerated probiotic. Doesn't leave me gassy or bloated as some of them do. No other GI problems, if you know what I mean. Taking it as part of my Keto routine. So far, very good results.
customer_reviews.author: Princess

customer_reviews.title: Taking Women's ProDaily actually works!
customer_reviews.text: I have had body circulation, digestive, and skin related issues while taking antibiotics. Noticeable positive results happened with me on the second day of taking Women's Pro-Daily. The positive results are the following: better body circulation, therefore more energy, improved digestion, and clearer and brighter skin especially on my forehead. Thank you Women's Pro-Daily for saving me from long term misery.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Chung

customer_reviews.title: Too expensive
customer_reviews.text: The product is fine although it's not competitively priced. Keep in mind you're only getting 30 in this bottle. I made the mistake of over looking this detail when I ordered.
customer_reviews.author: fuzzy logic

customer_reviews.title: I take 2 per day for immunity and vaginal health
customer_reviews.text: These are nice because they are vegan/vegetarian/gluten free and have more CFU** strains than your typical probiotic. Also you don't have to keep them in the fridge which is nice. I do take these after my morning oatmeal but have tried them without food before, and they never upset my tummy. I only take 2 but they say you can take up to 4 per day for optimal results. Highly recommend. I take these for my immune system and to avoid HSV-2 outbreaks.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle N

customer_reviews.title: Finallyyyyy
customer_reviews.text: I got them yesterday and decided to try them right away! I’ve had some odor on and off for a while now soooo uncomfortable. The smell would get worse after sex and lasts days, weeks. I read in one of the reviews a woman stuck one right up in there lol I was like what!! And of course I tried it. I’ve had some not so pleasant spotting with an odor. I took 2 orally and 1 my vag and no more discharge and no more smell. It’s only been a day and I already loveeeee. Life changingggg
customer_reviews.author: D

customer_reviews.title: Best probiotic
customer_reviews.text: We've repurchased these numerous times. Recent studies show that a single course of antibiotics can destroy your gut flora for six months or longer. Post major surgery (2 weeks in hospital, 2 month recovery at home), took these for six months and despite a 'depressed immune' haven't been sick all year. I'm not making any 'claims' (we made a lot of other changes too) but gut health is related to immune health. These are the best we've found and we trust this brand and also their Pro-50 product.
customer_reviews.author: Lizabeta

customer_reviews.title: You'll love them!!
customer_reviews.text: Update!! Coupon for free bottle is not specific to a product. So, in other words not really free if you paid more than $19.99 for your bottle. You also have to buy from their website which is stupid expensive shipping. I'll just keep buying from Amazon. Product is great, company not so much. All the other reviews are true!! It's helped me so much!! I love them! Finally found the right probiotics for me! I feel more energised, more focused and on top of things. I'm so glad I bought it, I was kinda sceptical but I was so desperate for help. Now, I can't be without it!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Garza

customer_reviews.title: Risky.
customer_reviews.text: Made me ill which has never happened with any other probiotic. Also the capsules are somehow covered in the powder despite the package coming sealed.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: Not buying these again
customer_reviews.text: Took one pill in the morning and 2 hours later I got sick to my stomach and vomited everything back up. These probiotics definitely did not agree with me.
customer_reviews.author: Angelika Pelland

customer_reviews.title: Definitely worth it!
customer_reviews.text: Honestly I don't give reviews on things unless I really feel like they work. I get frequent yeast infections, and I've had all the over the counter medicines you can try. I had a yeast infection when I ordered these and I was desperate for a "quick" cure since I don't have insurance or access to a doctor right now. I noticed my symptoms clear up within three days and I haven't had any issues since. My sexual health has also improved as well! My boyfriend said I tasted sweeter and I personally didn't have issues with staying lubricated like I usually do. All in all, I'm definitely going to keep taking these. I can't find any cons!
customer_reviews.author: 🖤

customer_reviews.title: Great Probiotic & UTI prevention for women!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter highly recommended Vitamin Bounty Women's Pro-Daily, because I asked her how I could boost my immune system. Since I have occasional UTI's, I was happy to learn that this product not only helps increase my immune system, but it targets UTI's to help prevent them. I purchased a bottle of 60 veggie caps, which is a month's supply and I am about halfway through it. There is no flavor, the 2 caps are easy to swallow and I have not experienced anything negative. In fact, I am shopping for my next bottle, but Amazon is sold out and doesn't know if they will have it available again. I don't want to run out!
customer_reviews.author: TofuYumYum

customer_reviews.title: Solid wide-spectrum probiotics. Really did the trick, nearly instant regularity.
customer_reviews.text: Within just a couple days I was already completely satisfied with this product. I've taken many probiotics before, but this one is the quickest in my experience in achieving desired effects, which is settling my gut into a predictable pattern. I also found that after taking daily for 2 weeks, I'm able to back off to taking only once every two to three days without reverting to my old unpredictable digestion. Very pleased, will be buying regularly.
customer_reviews.author: isaactly

customer_reviews.title: BV Prevention
customer_reviews.text: I started using this product for BV prevention. I have been plagued with this for many years. To the point of having a doctor convince me to have a hysterectomy at a far too early age to remedy the chronic infection. Needless to say...that didnt work. I have been taking many supplements and homemade cocktails for years to avoid so many antibiotics. I found this product over a 2 months ago and I will not go without it. It has prevented and or helped the infection go away before getting bad enough to need a prescription. I take this everyday and reccomend to anyone suffering with the same issue.
customer_reviews.author: Jillian

customer_reviews.title: Caused Stomach Pain
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed in this product. I took only 1 capsule. Then after an hour or so, I developed this horrible taste in my mouth and my stomach started hurting. I'm afraid to take any more. 10/19/2018 I gave the above product a one star rating based on my personal experience. I have raised it to a 3 star because the company is so nice and that others may have benefitted from the probiotics. I did not request a refund; just chalked it up to lesson learned. They actually contacted me and told me they were issuing a refund. I would give the company a 5 star rating.
customer_reviews.author: Josephine

customer_reviews.title: The best Probiotic
customer_reviews.text: I have tried other probiotics and initially they worked but nothing like Vitamin Bounty. This product, hand down, is the best. Easy to swallow, no after taste and great price for the quality. True story...I was so bloated, I was miseable. After the 2 day, my bloating subsided and my gut felt so much better. Thanks Vitamin Bounty!
customer_reviews.author: Teisha

customer_reviews.title: works great
customer_reviews.text: Great probiotic that does not need to be refrigerated. I have tried many different brands and I keep coming back to this one. It seems to work the best and doesn't have any side effects.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela Navarro

customer_reviews.title: Great product - it works for me
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product because of dietary issues and constant reoccurring yeast infections. I was already taking a daily probiotic like Align, but it was not helping like it should for more serious issues. I started taking the Vitamin Bounty and my symptoms drastically decreased. The strain that they use works for me. I know that everyone is different so you have to experiment, but this products works wonders for me! A month later, and I am still yeast free and no other GI issues (other than gallstones). Give it a try and see if it works for you!
customer_reviews.author: Spydwoman

customer_reviews.title: Definitely Helps
customer_reviews.text: I bought this mainly for the vaginal health aspect but think it helps with a lot more than just that! Helps with my bloating and overall daily health. It’s always good to be taking a probiotic and i will definitely repurchase.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: Healthy so far...
customer_reviews.text: I started taking these almost 2 months ago and held off on writing a review until I had some experience with them. I'm happy to report that so far, I've managed to avoid 2 rounds of colds/respiratory infections in my house and credit these new probiotics with keeping me healthy. My kids and husband have all been sick and I remained fine. The pills go down smoothly, unlike some of the large chalk pills I've taken from other companies, which is another bonus. There are no side effects and so far, they're keeping me healthy.
customer_reviews.author: bobbabooie

customer_reviews.title: Nice, inexpensive Probiotic
customer_reviews.text: My gastro-guy recommended I take a probiotic. He said "any" probiotic was fine. Did not need to be the kind that goes in the refrigerator. That sounded perfect for me. I just take it with my other meds and vitamins. This one seems to do the trick and is easy to take. I have decided to put it on automatic shipping since it is working so well.
customer_reviews.author: Vickie

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: Took me some time to do research on finding the right prebiotic and luckily with this pro daily immunity, it was a combo of pre and probiotics... I have noticed that my bloating has gone down and as well as my weight with little or no exercise. I am on week 2 and will update later on status. I intend to purchase another bottle to continue my streak and although there are so many varieties with VB, I believe pro daily immunity is the best choice for me.
customer_reviews.author: a92r

customer_reviews.title: Great for female diabetics
customer_reviews.text: This product has been great for me. Dealing with excess yeast/and yeast infections for a few years. Took a while for this product to do what it needed (I'm only taking one pill a day, two seems to be too much for me), but I've been feeling much better thanks to this product. I was recently sick and went through two rounds of antibiotics. Didn't end up with a yeast infection. I think it's thanks to this wonderful product.
customer_reviews.author: M.

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I just want to say that I have suffered from frequent bacterial vaginitis. My doctors would just perscribe antibiotics, which would take care of the infection but only temporarily. I have been on Vitamin Bounty Womens Daily Probiotic for 2 weeks now and I can honestly say that I feel so much better. I would definitely recommend a women suffering from any vaginal infections to try this product.
customer_reviews.author: The Shapiro's

customer_reviews.title: Good probiotic
customer_reviews.text: I have used different brands of probiotic medicines over the past few years. Some have created digestion issues and some have had not provided any comfort to me and some have been good but pricey. But this one has been effective on multiple levels - easy on my stomach, helped me to calm my digestion when I eat those "trigger" foods that cause havoc on my stomach and also pretty reasonably priced. Now, I can take this one per day and not feel that I am spending lot of money on my probiotics.
customer_reviews.author: Good guy!

customer_reviews.title: Prodaily
customer_reviews.text: I have really bad stomach pain & my previous pre & probiotic didn't seem to be helping any longer since a formulation change. My package came with some missing medication so waiting for a replacement but I have had the ProDaily50 before switching to this one. The 50 was a little too strong made me very gassy if I took the 2 daily as recommended. As soon as I'm able to get the replacement and start the new one I'll update but so far I'm very happy with VitaminBounty's products.
customer_reviews.author: VerifiedBuyer

customer_reviews.title: Have noticed a difference in my energy and mood
customer_reviews.text: I liked that it had two of the "happy" probiotic strains: Lactobacillus rhamnosus (reduced signs of stress, anxiety, and depression) and Bifidobacterium longum ("after the treatment, patients showed markedly decreased cortisol levels, resulting in a better mood".)
customer_reviews.author: v sanford

customer_reviews.title: Good product.
customer_reviews.text: So far I tried it for a little more than a month and I felt the difference on my digestive system. I used to have some pain after eating certain foods and now I don't have it. Also had frequent urination and that has stopped. Very pleased so fat for the product. Only problem I see is that there are not in stock and have to find them somewhere else.
customer_reviews.author: M. Keever

customer_reviews.title: Side effects weren’t worth it for me
customer_reviews.text: This supplement didn’t really worked for me. It caused me to be bloated 24/7. At first I didn’t realize that it was the probiotic that was causing that. As soon as I had a meal or even a snack I would get this unpleasant rumbling in my stomach and gas that wouldn’t go away for hours. I finally stopped taking the probiotic and the symptoms went away. I can’t deal with this kind of side effects so I won’t be using it anymore. I tried other probiotics that work way better than this blend.
customer_reviews.author: Katie L.

customer_reviews.title: Enjoying the Benefits so Far
customer_reviews.text: I struggle with frequent UTIs and yeast infections for the last year or so. My doctor hasn't been able to find an underlying cause as of yet, only prescribes antibiotics. These wreak havoc on my system and cause even more problems for me. I've tried all preventive methods I know to try. I currently have a yeast infection and ordered these last week. I've been taking the maximum 3-4 daily. I am gradually noticing my symptoms improving. I know these probably cannot fully rid the infection, but I'm hoping as a prevention these will help me both with UTI and yeast infections in the future. So far so good!
customer_reviews.author: Miranda

customer_reviews.title: Loyal buyer!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this product. I originally bought because my doctor recommended a vaginally probiotic to deal with BV, when I saw this was a 3/1 I was pretty much sold. Not only have I not had any issues with BV since I started taking in March 2019 but my bowel movements are silky smooth and DAILY! Sometimes twice a day, never have a issue when I’m taking this supplement. Recommend it to anyone in need.
customer_reviews.author: Thiana

customer_reviews.title: The one that makes a difference
customer_reviews.text: This a great probiotic for me.. I have much less bloating and have not had UTI since I started it.
customer_reviews.author: Evelyn

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I've had better digestive system and less vaginal discomfort after taking these probiotics. I take them religiously everyday. I haven't had any issues with packing or receiving the probiotic pills, they don't smell or have any weird after taste either. If you're looking for some new probiotics or want to switch, I highly recommend Vitamin Bounty women's pro-daily. I'm on my 4th bottle and about to order my 5th!
customer_reviews.author: Sylvz

customer_reviews.title: Love this probiotic
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with this product added into my daily routine. It has helped my stomach significantly and I appreciate the added ashwagandha for stress regulation. Adaptogens are important to take daily in small doses and this being added into something I am taking daily already has been a nice benefit. The women specific components were what initially drew me to it and they have proved to be helpful. I also liked that it does not require refrigeration (as most do but are not shipped accordingly which always made me doubt their effectiveness). Overall, I will buy this again- it's a well-rounded and inclusive supplement that goes beyond what you can expect out of a typical probiotic.
customer_reviews.author: brandi

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: For the past 2/3 months I started getting yeast infections although I’ve never had an issue with them before my whole life. I tried the creams, pills, home remedies and nothing is working. I even tried another Expensive probiotic and it still came back. So after looking over review after review, I decided to try these. It’s only been three days but I feel like I can see a change already. I only gave it 4 stars because it’s too early to tell if it will come back. I will give it some time and do another review. It also seems to be helping my stomach as well
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany H

customer_reviews.title: Saved my stomach
customer_reviews.text: I have major stomach issues. I wake up & go to sleep with stomach aches. I also have IBS with bouts of occasional constipation. Only after a few days of taking both the pre and pro biotics of this same brand, I have been more "regular" in the a.m. My morning stomach pains have started to subside significantly too! I dont ever want to be with out either one of these supplements. Game changer for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Themira ArcinoTop Contributor: Coloring

customer_reviews.title: Helps with Endometriosis Problems
customer_reviews.text: I have endometriosis that has covered my organs to the point that I was told I need a bowel resection; I have been able to avoid the surgery so far and my pain is improved. I have been taking probiotics and another supplement to help me. I recently started taking this product and it is really helping me. It also helped when I was sick with a nasty respiratory infection. It is easy to swallow and I have no side effects. It also has prebiotics.
customer_reviews.author: Quitty Wit

customer_reviews.title: Finally a probiotic that works!
customer_reviews.text: I have been on a nasty dose of antibiotics for the last two weeks. Preparing for the inevitable yeast infection after every antibiotic round, I ordered the Vitamin Bounty Probiotic and Prebiotic for Women.. I started taking the probiotics three days before the end of my antibiotics. Not only have I no signs of a Yeast issues, but my tummy is completely chilled and I am stunningly surprised!! Thank you for finally bringing such a fabulous probiotics to the forefront. I will most definitely be ordering more of this FABULOUS product!!
customer_reviews.author: Jen B.

customer_reviews.title: What's not to love?!
customer_reviews.text: This product is still fire, lol. Not only bc it truly does what it advertise. But the customer service and quality of the product is so on point. I feel it is the one product that never skips on producing a consistently great product. I have ordered for awhile now, and having tried others...well, they just don't compare. No after taste and extremely easy to swallow. Never broken pills in the bottle and fresh new withing expiration date sent each time. No complaints! :)
customer_reviews.author: MamaBear6

customer_reviews.title: There are positive reviews for a reason
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Struggled with BV and yeast infections for 15 years. I haven't had any issues since switching over to this probiotic. Let's put it this way, I wouldn't be writing this review if I wasn't planning on repurchasing this product! Trust that it has worked for my flora and very well could work for yours - it is worth trying if you're struggling.
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: So far so good!
customer_reviews.text: These are your run-of-the-mill capsules, fine to swallow for me, but I don't usually encounter problems with that. I've been taking them with (sometimes smaller than I'd like) meals and no nausea so far. I like that they are not refrigerated. I can't really attest to any health effects as I haven't had them long and it's the first supplement like this I have taken, but I will update in the future if there's anything to report. For the price I could see myself continuing to purchase,
customer_reviews.author: A. B.

customer_reviews.title: Great for the body!
customer_reviews.text: I thought taking these vitamins would cause some bad after taste but it really didn’t. I have been searching for a pro biotic specifically for woman and seen these product. Read some of the reviews and decided to try this one. I started to notice a difference about a week or two later with no bloating and felt more energized. Just the thought of knowing I’m taking a vitamin to help with a clean track is a great feeling. There is no bad taste or burping of it so that’s great too. Definitely buying again.
customer_reviews.author: TheOne86

customer_reviews.title: Feminine odor, irregular bowels, no problem! This product is the real deal!
customer_reviews.text: Before I tried this specific probiotic, I had tried several like this and also tried live cultures and nothing could compare. I have severe stomach issues and female problems my whole life. This product has made the bad odor to my feminine issues gone completely after only a few weeks and my bowls have regulated about 75% which is a miracle in its self! This product is the real deal amd worth every penny! I hope this helps whoever's is reading this! Give it a full month of usage 2x a day and it will make a difference!
customer_reviews.author: L. Sharp

customer_reviews.title: Better than other product
customer_reviews.text: After using the RepHresh Pro-B Probiotic Supplement for Women, 30 Oral Capsules with no results I went ahead and googled the top brands for women’s probiotic. I found the vitamin bounty with positive reviews. I decided to purchase it in which I noticed a change within 1 week. It helped with my reoccurring BV and yeast infections. Not only did it help with that it also helped me with my gas I’ve always had issues with. I would recommend this to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Irene j.

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I just ordered my third bottle of the years and I’m quite pleased with the product! There’s no weird aftertaste the pills are veggie caps and easy to swallow. I do notice a subtle difference and in my overall energy and well-being when I don’t take them for a few days. I do enjoy the occasional glass of wine or a glass of beer and I feel like this product really helps my overall and gut health. I also love that these are formulated especially for women.
customer_reviews.author: Megan Pfaff

customer_reviews.title: An Actual EFFECTIVE PROBIOTIC!
customer_reviews.text: I have struggled with various digestive problems over the years including bloating, constipation, and queasiness. I have taken other probotics in the past and my symptoms barely alleviate. After taking this product for a few days, I IMMEDIATELY saw an improvement in my gut issues. I will definitely recommend this product for anyone struggling with digestive issues.
customer_reviews.author: Andrae L

customer_reviews.title: Great Probiotic
customer_reviews.text: I am in my 30s and female, and I honestly haven't taken probiotics before, but decided to give this one a try based on the positive reviews. I was experiencing some annoying "have to go to the bathroom quickly" situations after eating certain foods. Taking this has stopped most gassy feelings, bloating, etc. and I feel like my stomach just feels better. I forgot to take it one day and I honestly could feel the difference that day when I forgot... Highly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Bonjour5678

customer_reviews.title: Too many bad side effects!
customer_reviews.text: On the second day of taking 2 in the morning and 2 at night, my nose turned red and itchy. Then my face. On the third day, same thing, but my throat also got a tickle and burned. Today, I got a headache, chest pain, throat burning, and pelvic pain like I'm menstruating. These will be going back, just not for me.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Loving these products!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this and the 15 day detox. Both products have been amazing. Gotta be careful, and near a toilet, with the detox!! I just finished my single dose 1st 5 days. Starting the double tonight. Fingers crossed!!
customer_reviews.author: ERica O.

customer_reviews.title: BV symptoms reduced!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: If you have frequent problems of BV & BM THIS IS LEGIT. Week 2 of the product and it’s helped DRASTICALLY with the BV discharge problems (without even needing a prescription of antibiotics) as far as BM it’s definitely helped but hoping it gets better with time. Although, definitely buying again!
customer_reviews.author: Gabs

customer_reviews.title: and worked like a CHARM
customer_reviews.text: I was prescribed antibiotics for BV, and have suffered from reccuring yeast infections throughout my life. I was sure I would get one again because of the antibiotics, so I purchased these probiotics after doing hours of research on the bacterial cultures most found intravaginally. This had the most representation, and worked like a CHARM. I took two every morning about 30 minutes before my antibiotic, and I have had nothing but positive news since beginning. I am now finished with my antibiotics, and did NOT get a yeast infection!!
customer_reviews.author: UserMT

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: No pill (containing natural or synthetic ingredients) is a “miracle cure” or perfectly fixes anything. However, there is a lot of eveidence out there about the importance of keeping the bacteria in our guts balanced for our overall health and that probiotics can be helpful in achieving that. Personally, I always seem to be very bloated by the end of the day, sometimes even as soon as I eat breakfast I start bloat, but this probiotic has really helped with that. I’m on my 3rd bottle and it has made a huge difference for me. I’ve also noticed that I don’t retain nearly as much water during my period. Overall, I definitely recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Jessie

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I recently started having problems with BV. My primary care physician told me to start taking probiotics. I don’t eat yogurt because I don’t want too much dairy in my system. I did a search on probiotics and vitamin bounty came up. I Started taking it for about a week, my BV has completely disappeared. I’m not into taking medication so I’m happy that I just need to take probiotics. I definitely will buy this product again.
customer_reviews.author: Rena H

customer_reviews.title: This stuff is amazing
customer_reviews.text: I have always had an irregular digestive pattern and recently I have started to break out on my chin area because I was so irregular, someone suggested I take probiotics for it. I take 2 of these everyday with my lunch and dinner and this works great to keep me regular and my chin acne has reduced tremendously. Also I have noticed a difference in my vaginal health, I am more comfortable during sex and overall just feels healthier! I will always use this probiotic I love it!!

customer_reviews.text: I was hoping it would work but it didn't do anything for me I gave it 2 weeks and it's just not cutting it for me. I purchased another brand and I feel like it's doing its job and only 4 days in with the new one.. everyone's body is different but this wasn't for me.
customer_reviews.author: Customer jenny

It has also dealt with issues of bloating I've had as well, it feels good to have my flat tummy back :)

Tell you to post a picture with the bottle to get the free bottle. I did. Nevr got a free bottle, neither did the person to whom I gifted a 2nd bottle!! Otherwise, I would have rated 5 stars.

customer_reviews.title: These really work.
customer_reviews.text: I’m amazed at how well these work. I have a son in Kindergarten and every time he gets sick I get sick. This kid coughs and sneezes and breathes in my face all the time. I got tired of being sick all the time and orders these two months ago. I have not gotten sick since. My son got the flu three weeks ago along with everyone in my office and I was the only one that didn’t get sick. I know with 100% certainty that these works. I’m signing up for the subscription now.

As expected it took a while until it really worked, after all we're talking about growing a good bacteria in the gut. It took 1-2 weeks to actually feel the effect, but it did work. Made me feel better and I was cured...naturally.

Then I read the box and realized these are freeze dried, and not live. No wonder! The pills are pretty large and harder to swallow, too.

I take Ashwagandha daily, so i am super excited that, that is one of the ingredients included. On top of that it contains Magnesium Stearate, another supplement I take. It is a well rounded product that I had a hard time finding. Now that I found this product I will not be using anything else!

Was happy to see this product includes the Probiotic and the Prebiotic in one pill. No refrigeration required which is another perk for me.

customer_reviews.title: I really like taking these
customer_reviews.text: I really like taking these. They give you a sense of well-being. And when I tell you that they are great at supporting vaginal issues...you better believe it. Odor completely gone. And I am super satisfied that it is not just a one trip pony product. This product does so many other things that are beneficial to a woman's health. I am looking forward to long-term use. Highly recommend.

customer_reviews.title: I believe this Probiotic kept me from illnesses that others ...
customer_reviews.text: I believe this Probiotic kept me from illnesses that others got. 13 Probiotic strains and 50 billion organisms are top notch in Probiotics. Thanks for taking health and wellness to such a high standard!

customer_reviews.title: This is really good
customer_reviews.text: My digestion is a lot better. I feel like it helps with bloating a little bit. I eat a very high in fiber, almost entirely plant based diet, which can be difficult to digest, and I think these probiotics are helping.

When I first started using it, I understood why people in the reviews saw an increase of discharge. I think that’s subsided since, though.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Hope

customer_reviews.title: Misleading.
customer_reviews.text: These are a nice size pill but I take pills easy and just added them in to my normal regimen. Excited to see results from them- will update! Want you to fill a survey to get a free bottle but then they don’t give you the free bottle of the item you actually ordered. On my box it said get a free bottle and On the specific bottle it says “want a free bottle- contact us to find out how.” I contacted them and they wouldn’t let me get the thing I actually use - they wanted me to choose from items I don’t actually use. The customer service rep was rude and would not help me.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie

customer_reviews.title: Great Results
customer_reviews.text: After being told by my doctor to take probiotics tried several brands before these. I was very disappointed and couldn't tell a difference after trying them for 30 days. I am now on my 4 th month of Pro-Daily and am totally happy. Overall my stomach feels better and I've felt great! Huge difference and couldn't be happier! My husband and daughter are both taking these and have had the same great results.
customer_reviews.author: Bob C.

customer_reviews.title: I think it works
customer_reviews.text: I would say they work because I haven’t gotten any yeast infection since taking them. I got them because I was getting yeast infection regularly. After my yeast infection went away I didn’t take these consistently like I should have so I’m not sure the effectiveness but I’m taking them now due to the fact that I’m on OvuSense and I rather not get any kind of infection while on that so hopefully it does work.

This product is a pre and pro biotic and it has ashwagandha root in it which is also suppose to help with hormonal imbalance and stress. So far this has really been helping me sleep better at night and my hormonal issues have improved a lot since starting this. I am extremely impressed and I will continue to order this. Thanks for making such an amazing product.

I bought this to prevent vaginal irritation and to help stomach/digestive issues. I have to say, that since I have started using this product I have had no vaginal or stomach issues. In fact, when I would usually experience bloating it has virtually disappeared. I will definitely purchase this product again.

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased
customer_reviews.text: I've tried a couple different probiotics but have read so many great reviews for this particular brand that I was excited to give it a try. It works well, is easy to swallow and I haven't noticed any bloating using this product. I've struggled with IBS in the past and eating well and taking a probiotic like this one definitely alleviates my symptoms. I like the added cranberry as well - good for vaginal health! I'll be sticking with this brand!

customer_reviews.title: Really Good
customer_reviews.text: I think this has really helped my body. I'm processing things better and I believe it has really helped with my vaginal health, via bacteria balance.

customer_reviews.title: Best product
customer_reviews.text: I take one pill a day and I have noticed a huge difference. You will tinkle a little more often I feel, but it’s pushing out all the bad. I highly recommend every woman try this. You can take up to 4 a day, but if you aren’t use to probiotics, take one and build yourself up.

customer_reviews.title: Most amazing probiotic you can buy!
customer_reviews.text: My favorite probiotic for years. It’s often sold out and I do not have to wonder why. I have tried many, MANY probiotics over the years and none have even come close to the benefits from this particular one. Both my stomach and my female parts benefit heavily from taking this and it also helps my anxiety issues. I notice a huge difference when buying other brands and always come back to this one. Five years running and it remains a favorite. I usually get some sort of side effect from other brands like loose stools or stomach cramps but this has done nothing but improve my overall health and I will be a loyal customer for life

customer_reviews.text: This is the best I have found so far. I saw immediate changes in my tummy. This is the only probiotic that I have purchased again. I usually go to another product.

So I dont have to worry about taking my probiotic vitamins bc its already in this vitamin. I think its important to keep the vagina cleaned and with natural products, although the vagina is self cleansing, its still important to have. I also love that the capsules are vegetarian friendly.
customer_reviews.author: MieChonya Solomon

product_meta.title: Vitamin Bounty Probiotic & Prebiotic for Women - 10 Billion CFUs Per Serving with Cranberry, 5 Strains - for Feminine Health, bv Defense & pH Balance
product_meta.description: Style:Womens Probiotic 60ctVitamin Bounty Probiotic For Women. Our womens probiotics contain cranberry, and prebiotics specifically targeted to help a womans microbiome, and also help with vaginal and urinary health. Keep your pH balanced and treat bv with Vitamin Bounty.
feature_bullets: TARGETED PROBIOTIC STRAINS - Women's Pro-Daily Probiotic is designed with specific probiotic strains & cranberry in order to not only support a healthy digestive system, but also support vaginal health including BV treatment and help balance pH.

FORMULATED FOR WOMEN - Intended for the unique needs of women, our Women’s Pro-Daily Probiotic also delivers key minerals and extracts that have been shown to work well with a diverse and powerful blend of prebiotic FOS and probiotics.*
MAXIMUM EFFICACY - Women’s Pro-Daily Probiotic uses a delayed-release capsule that protects the organisms from stomach acid, delivering more cultures and ensuring maximum efficacy.

DIGESTIVE & IMMUNE SUPPORT - Designed with the specific probiotic strains crucial to female digestive health and immune system support, intended to get you the right probiotics specific to your needs.

VAGINAL & URINARY SUPPORT - Designed to be the perfect vaginal probiotic, urinary health and bv treatment* which is why it includes key added ingredients, such as: cranberry, ashwagandha & black cohosh root.
